definition: Sichuan/originally two provinces of Qin and Han
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
short name for Sichuan 四川[Si4 chuan1] province/one of the Three Kingdoms 三國|三国[San1 guo2] after the Han dynasty, also called 蜀漢|蜀汉[Shu3 Han4], situated around what is now Sichuan province

sentences.english: Character of Bashu, is the third evidence to research the history of Bashu.
sentences.chinese: 巴蜀文字，就是巴蜀歷史研究中的第三重證據。

sentences.english: Character of Bashu, is the third evidence to research the history of Bashu.
sentences.chinese: 巴蜀文字，就是巴蜀歷史研究中的第三重證據。

sentences.english: She was a Chinese teacher and a class head-teacher.
sentences.chinese: 曾任巴蜀小學高段語文教師兼班主任。

sentences.english: Chen Ziang is one of the most outstanding prose writers in the Sui, Tang and Five Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 陳子昂是隋唐五代巴蜀最優秀的散文家之一。

sentences.english: The children in Bashu school are delightful and so talented.
sentences.chinese: 巴蜀小學的孩子們是那麼可愛而有才能的。

sentences.english: The Bashu United League is an organization of people from Sichuan Province in China and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 巴蜀同盟會是由海內外四川人組成的組織。

sentences.english: If this is the case, where did the Ba-Shu United League obtain its numbers?
sentences.chinese: 這是實情，那麼巴蜀同盟會的數據又是如何得出的呢？

sentences.english: The final chapter, on the status quo of Bashu Paifang and protection were also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最後一章，對巴蜀牌坊的現狀與保護作了粗略探討。

sentences.english: People call it the King of Bells in Sichuan.
Before late Tang Dynasty, Bashu's tea economy is quite flourishing.
sentences.chinese: 唐中後期以前，巴蜀地區茶業經濟較發達。

sentences.english: His entering Sichuan had had a great impact on this exact region.
sentences.chinese: 張詠的入蜀，對巴蜀地域產生了較大的影響。

sentences.english: Days of torrential rain in Prachuap County, Thailand, caused severe flooding.
sentences.chinese: 泰國巴蜀縣，連日豪雨淹水成災。

sentences.english: This article second chapter elaborated the poets before Tang Dynasty to Bashu culture's sing.
sentences.chinese: 本文第二章論述了唐代以前詩人對巴蜀的歌詠。

sentences.english: Bashu garden is the enormous energy resources.
sentences.chinese: 巴蜀園林就是這一巨大的能量資源之一。

sentences.english: The headmaster of Cedar Primary School visited our school.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡四德小學校長訪問巴蜀。

sentences.english: Tea culture was inferentially traceable to Sichuan at the middle or late Neolithic Age.
sentences.chinese: 茶文化是在我國新石器時代中期或晚期起源於巴蜀。

definition: name of old state in modern Sichuan
short name for Sichuan 四川[Si4 chuan1] province/one of the Three Kingdoms 三國|三国[San1 guo2] after the Han dynasty, also called 蜀漢|蜀汉[Shu3 Han4], situated around what is now Sichuan province
Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
Jingzhou prefecture-level city on Changjiang in Hubei
Central Plain, the middle and lower regions of the Yellow river, including Henan, western Shandong, southern Shanxi and Hebei
Hanzhong prefecture-level city in Shaanxi
Liangzhou district of Wuwei city 武威市[Wu3 wei1 shi4], Gansu
Xiangyang district of Xiangfan city 襄樊市[Xiang1 fan2 shi4], Hubei
Longxi county in Dingxi 定西[Ding4 xi1], Gansu
short name for Gansu province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]

Yiling (barbarian mound), historical place name in Yichang county 宜昌縣|宜昌县 Hubei, first mentioned in history (after its destruction by Qin) as burial place of the former Chu kings/Yiling district of Yichang city 宜昌市[Yi2 chang1 shi4], Hubei
Sichuan/the state of Shu in Sichuan at different periods/the Shu Han dynasty (214-263) of Liu Bei 劉備|刘备 during the Three Kingdoms
Jiangdong district of Ningbo city 寧波市|宁波市[Ning2 bo1 shi4], Zhejiang
land of plenty/Heavenly province (epithet of Sichuan, esp. area around Chengdu)
Nanzheng County in Hanzhong 漢中|汉中[Han4 zhong1], Shaanxi
Han River (Hanshui)
